ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.1_0: had sexual intercourse with the seventh.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.2_0: and sexual intercourse with the three kinds of mindfulness meditation:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.3_0: they may be resolved face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.4_0: they may be covering over as if with grass and leaves ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, that is to say, the seventh, and the pieces of grain.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.2_0: If a nun, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, and settles the seventh day.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.3_0: We may be resolved face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted. And there may be covering over as if with grass.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:3.1_0: The seventh section for recitation is finished.
